attributes.action: TELL US what you are actually DOING for your money nowadays.
attributes.additional_details: Yet another 10000 signature response tells us that you have no authority or responsibility in that area.  There are so many of these 'not our problem' responses to petitions that we wonder what you are doing.  We know you take the country to war; we know you hand out billions of taxpayer pounds to foreign dictators to keep them in luxury; we know you take any and every opportunity to increase the cost of government of this country - mainly through improvements in the ways our 650 electeds can significantly increase their personal wealth BUT what are you actually responsible for elsewhere in our society?
